title: Responsible Practices for Scientific Software
description: A collection of responsible practices for developing and publishing FAIR+ computational models in efforts to be more transparent, interoperable, and reusable in our work.

title: Introduction to Git and Github
description: Familiarize yourself with Git and Github by taking part in a small interactive course hosted on Github classrooms.

title: Introduction to Containerization
description: Join this GitHub classroom to learn about containerization, a way to bundle and archive your code in a reproducible manner. Follow step-by-step guidance on how to containerize an example NetLogo model with transparency and longevity in mind.

title: Containerizing your R Model on RStudio
description: Learn how to containerize an R model in a Docker image and use RStudio within the container.

title: Containerizing a NetLogo Model in Headless Mode
description: Learn how to containerize a NetLogo model in a Docker image in headless mode (without a graphical interface).

title: Archiving your Model on CoMSES Net
description: A step-by-step walkthrough of archiving a model in our Computational Model Library.
